story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: prestige_override
primary_trope.hook_text: Gravel Worlds's tier was OVERRIDDEN. Here's why.
primary_trope.mechanism: Zeigarnik effect — the unresolved question (is the override fair?) demands closure.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Gravel Worlds? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Gravel Worlds scored 79 out of 100. The Icons tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Gravel Worlds. Lincoln, Nebraska (Sandhills Global Event Center). 150 mi. Long, hot, and humbling. NOT flat. 'hill after hill after hill' averaging 4-5% grade either up or down the entire 150 miles through iconic cornfields. 10K+ feet of climbing with no single killer climb, just relentless rolling. Mud possible in wet years.
beats.text_on_screen: Gravel Worlds | Lincoln, Nebraska (Sandhills Global Event Center) | 150 mi
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Let's go through the scores. Length. 5 out of 5. Ultra distance. Bring lights and a plan. Carey Lowery's race strategy reveals the 150-mile grind: "Last year it took 3:25 to go 54 miles; this year, 4:30. Climate. 5 out of 5. Extreme conditions guaranteed. Dress accordingly. Prestige. 5 out of 5. Gravel royalty. The race everyone knows. 16-year history from grassroots to $100K prize purse. Experience. 5 out of 5. This race ruins other races for you. The combination of pirate theme, Nebraska heat survival, and relentless terrain creates defining memories. Community. 5 out of 5. Family reunion energy. Everyone belongs. Adventure. 4 out of 5. The kind of ride you'll tell stories about. Beyond standard gravel roads, the course includes "cobble-filled alleyways, brief singletrack, and dirt roads that become mud gambles when storms hit. Race Quality. 4 out of 5. Premium race experience. Well-organized with checkpoint support, convenience store stops mapped, and proper timing. Field Depth. 4 out of 5. Stacked field. Fast riders everywhere. The $100K purse (2025) draws serious pros.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest, in rapid succession. Value. 4 out of 5. Strong value proposition. Expenses. 4 out of 5. Your wallet will survive this one. Logistics. 3 out of 5. Gets the job done. Nothing fancy. Technicality. 3 out of 5. Technical enough to thin the pack. Elevation. 3 out of 5. The hills sort the trained from the untrained. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Sea level. Your lungs get a day off.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

strengths: Authenticity: Grassroots soul in a corporatized sport.
The community: Pirate culture means inclusive, welcoming energy.
The challenge: 150 miles in August Nebraska heat is no joke.

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.narration: What they don't put on the website.
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

weaknesses: The heat: August humidity and heat can be punishing.
Nebraska: Not a tourist destination. You're here for the race.
Infrastructure: Less polished than Life Time events.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: Travel, lodging, and the unsexy details.

broll_sources.query: Lincoln, Nebraska (Sandhills Global Event Center) travel guide

beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Fly into: Omaha - 1 hour. Lincoln - 15 minutes but limited flights.
Lodging: Lincoln has ample hotels. Book 1-2 months ahead.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Grassroots Legend. Yes if you value authenticity, community, and genuine challenge over polish. Yes if you can handle August Midwest heat. Not if you need corporate production value.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Gravel Worlds isn't quite right for you. If you want heat without the distance: Unbound 100. If you want distance without the heat: fall ultra events. If you want grassroots elsewhere: local favorites.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Gravel Worlds? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, confused face, question marks floating, 'Gravel Worlds' bold text, tier badge 'THE ICONS', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
